Name: Ball
About the game: This game is set in the middle of the sky with laser, buttons, and laver. Roll the ball to the end as fast as you can. You can choose your ball's material or color, and unlock the particles by playing this game. There are few Easter eggs that you can find out in the game. This game looks pretty easy, but it's actually challenging to beat this game. If you like to beat an impossible game, try no checkpoint mode in this game. Even the maker of this game couldn't beat this mode. Only for the person who actually read the description, press G,L,S together in game. Maybe.. something will happen. %Don't Refund Because It's Too Hard!%
